full_summary:
**Converse Sites Works Project**
=====================================

**Project Summary**
-------------------

The Correctional Services of Canada (CSC) is inviting bids to renovate the bathroom in Building W13 at the Mountain Institution, a correctional facility located in Agassiz, BC. The project also includes the replacement of the sprinkler system tree. The works are to be completed within 36 weeks after contract award.

**Project Details**
-------------------

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3929272821 [-DP3941124740](https://federal-buyer/-DP3941124740)
*   **Tender Closing Date**: April 24, 2023, 2:00 PM PST
*   **Notice URL**: <https://discovery.acbtender.ca/rfx/15916949>
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The scope of work includes:

*   Plumbing system renovation and refurbishment
*   Irrigation system maintenance and management services
*   Commercial and office building renovation and repair service
*   Plumbing construction services

**Additional Requirements**
-------------------------

*   The project requires the contractor to have experience with building renovation and repair services, as well as plumbing and irrigation systems.
*   The contractor must have a valid business license and be registered with the relevant authorities.
*   The contractor will be required to provide a comprehensive project schedule and milestone dates.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   **Project Contact**: Lana Hunt
*   **Email**: \[lana.hunt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lana.hunt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Phone**: Not provided

**Trade Agreements**
--------------------

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Geographic Region**
-------------------

The project is restricted to bidders with a physical presence in British Columbia, Canada.
